BlackStorm:

Altough she was semi counceous, BlackStorm tried to  fight against 
the program that was forcing her to fall in stasis lock. Her 
survival spirit tried to avoid it whatever was the cost, but it 
didn't endure so long









--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Assassin" <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> Rodimus arrives back at the maximal base, transforming as he 
enters 
> the base.

> just await your return so we can get started.
>

> enduced stasis cycle.
>

difficult
